scripts.api:fetch: openapi-generator-cli generate -i src/api/spec/swagger.yaml -g typescript-fetch -o src/api/typescript-fetch -c src/api/typescript-fetch.json
scripts.api:rxjs: openapi-generator-cli generate -i src/api/spec/swagger.yaml -g typescript-rxjs -o src/api/typescript-rxjs -c src/api/typescript-rxjs.json
scripts.api:axios: openapi-generator-cli generate -i src/api/spec/swagger.yaml -g typescript-axios -o src/api/typescript-axios -c src/api/typescript-axios.json
